name: To Save A Toy
description: “To Save A Toy” is a stealth game that has a linear 3 act structure for gameplay. Our hero “Roy” is an archer. Hence the enemies that he will encounter are much stronger than him, our archer must set a course to save his friend by sneaking in, solving puzzles, and using tools to move forward in each level. More progress will bring more opportunities for the player, yet more challenging environments to overcome.
